SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CoreBootstrap
Controls the startup display and plugin initialization process
CoreFramework
CoreFramework - Central management system for all RhythmKnights plugins Handles plugin registration, hook management, and centralized messaging
CoreHookProcessor
Interface for plugin hook processors Individual plugins should implement this to handle their specific hook logic
CoreRegistry
Manages registered plugins and their information
FrameworkAPI
Main API interface for CoreFramework Provides methods for plugin registration and hook management
HookRequirement
Represents a hook requirement for a plugin
HookResult
Contains the results of hook processing
OutputCache
Caches console output to be displayed all at once This prevents other plugins from interrupting the formatted output display
RegisteredPlugin
Represents a plugin registered with CoreFramework
TextUtility
Single Source of Truth for all message formatting and sending across RhythmKnights plugins Handles both legacy and Adventure API formatting
